title: How to use a phone as a mic for a PC - Quora

response.answer_text: Check out the software WO Mic. Its a free software package to make this possible. It consists of a Android App for on your phone. And a Windows app for on your PC. The Android app sends the signal from the phone’s microfoon over USB, Bluetooth or wifi to the PC. On the PC the Windows app receives the audio signal and makes it available to other Apps on the PC by creating a virtual audio device. I have no experience with this software myself, but on paper it looks like a nice solution.
